en: The train was shuttling back and forth at the station, waiting for passengers to board.
pinyin: Huǒchē zài chēzhàn xiāng lái xiāng qù, děng zhe chéngkè shàng chē.

en: The horse galloped forward with its four hooves.
pinyin: Mǎ er xiāng zhe sì tí, fēi kuài de xiàng qián pǎo qù.

en: The performer executed a series of beautiful fancy movements and won the applause of the audience.
pinyin: Biǎoyǎnzhě xiāng chū yì chuàn piàoliang de huāshì dòngzuò, yíng dé le guānzhòngmen de zhǎngshēng.

en: Good students don't stay up as late as owls.
pinyin: Hǎo xuéshēng bù xiàng chīxiāo nàme wǎn shuìjiào.

en: His eyes are very large, just like an owl's eyes.
pinyin: Tā de yǎnjīng tèbié dà, jiù xiàng chīxiāo de yǎnjīng.

en: Owls fly on dark and windy nights.
pinyin: Chīxiāo zài yuè hēi fēng gāo de yèwǎn lǐ fēixíng.

en: It seems to hear a Chinese bamboo partridge calling in the mountains and forests.
pinyin: hǎo xiàng tīng dào yī zhī zhù chì zài shān lín zhōng míng jiào.

en: He heard a whistle, and the Chinese bamboo partridge immediately stopped calling.
pinyin: tā tīng dào yī shēng shào shēng, zhù chì lì kè tíng xià le jiào shēng.

en: Look at that Chinese bamboo partridge, its feathers are swaying like a floating ribbon.
pinyin: nǐ kàn nà zhī zhù chì, shēn shàng de yǔ máo yáo bǎi dé xiàng yī tiáo piāo dàng de cǎi dài.
